I like the TLoZ games, i just can't really play any of them. My DS died a long time ago, as did my Wii. Only one i have finished is Twilight Princess and i gave my copy of that to one of younger brothers friends who owns a Wii. I have an N64 emulator and have played through Majora's Mask a bit, but i haven't touched it for a while.
